item.title: My teleport code?
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

Ill get it for you

public void castVeng() { if(c.playerLevel[6] < 94) { c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); return; } if(c.playerLevel[1] < 40) { c.sendMessage("You need a defence level of 40 to cast this spell."); return; } if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(9075, 4) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(557, 10) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(560, 2)) { c.sendMessage("You don't have the required runes to cast this spell."); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastCast < 30000) { c.sendMessage("You can only cast vengeance every 30 seconds."); return; } if(c.vengOn) { c.sendMessage("You already have vengeance casted."); return; } c.startAnimation(4410); c.gfx100(726);//Just use c.gfx100 c.getItems().deleteItem2(9075, 4); c.getItems().deleteItem2(557, 10);//For these you need to change to deleteItem(item, itemslot, amount);. c.getItems().deleteItem2(560, 2); addSkillXP(2000, 6); c.stopMovement(); refreshSkill(6); c.vengOn = true; c.lastCast = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

If you don’t get it ill explain

Read full topic

item.title: My teleport code?
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

Haha, thanks for the help anyway, really appreciate it:) If anyone else knows what’s wrong then please give me a hand, this is what I’m with at the moment:

f (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3) && c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerXP[6]) > 24) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern"); c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(554,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3); c.getPA().addSkillXP(200, 6); } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3) && c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerXP[6]) < 25) { c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of 25 to use this spell."); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell."); return; } break;

item.title: My teleport code?
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

This is my teleport method for my PI server. It checks for runes & levels. It used to work and now for some reason it doesn’t. I’m not too sure why. Everything works, it just doesn’t check for level requirements.

[code=java]case 4140: //varrock

                    if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3) && c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerXP[6]) < 25) {
							c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of 25 to use this spell.");
							return;
					} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3) && c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerXP[6]) >= 25) {
                            c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern");
                            c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1);
                            c.getItems().deleteItem(554,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1);
                            c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3);
							c.getPA().addSkillXP(200, 6);
                    } else {
                            c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell.");
							return;
                    }
                    break;

case 4143: //Lumbridge

				if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3) && c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerXP[6]) < 31) {
							c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of 31 to use this spell.");
							return;
					} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3) && c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerXP[6]) >= 31) {
                            c.getPA().startTeleport(3221, 3217, 0, "modern");
                            c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1);
                            c.getItems().deleteItem(557,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1);
                            c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3);
							c.getPA().addSkillXP(350, 6);
                    } else {
                            c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell.");
							return;
                    }
                    break;


		case 4146: //Falador
					if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(555,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3) && c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerXP[6]) < 35) {
							c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of 35 to use this spell.");
							return;
					} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(555,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3) && c.getPA().getXPForLevel(c.playerXP[6]) >= 35) {
                            c.getPA().startTeleport(2964, 3380, 0, "modern");
                            c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1);
                            c.getItems().deleteItem(555,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1);
                            c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3);
							c.getPA().addSkillXP(500, 6);
                    } else {
                            c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell.");
							return;
                    }
                    break;[/code]

Read full topic
